title: [Question]any idea about when classes will start as I came here to do document verification and wants to go back home and take all my stuff with me
content: If anybody knows please let me know. As I will help me a lot to make my arrangements. Please help

comments.body: they said 4th or 11th of August , you have to gamble on thatðŸ˜¿
Odds are, you know more than most on this sub.
In the jee main second round of counselling, they said as soon as the kcet counselling finishes they will start the classes, august 2nd week, could be august 3rd week
They changed it bro. PESU KCET counselling is on 10th Aug and they've some one week doc verification after that. Also admission through r2 government CET  counselling  will also have to happen.
Yeah it ll start around 18 ig
